If you're having trouble with yt-dlp you can try and provide cookies as an option.

Download your cookies.txt file as per the documentation and move it to the root of 
/api folder next to this file and rename it to "cookies-yt.txt".

Your downloaded cookies.txt file should look something like this:

# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# https://curl.haxx.se/rfc/cookie_spec.html
# This is a generated file! Do not edit.

... all your youtube cookies
